pull.title: logging: Fix potential use-after-free in LogPrintStr(...)

events.message: logging: Fix potential use-after-free in LogPrintStr(...)

events.body: Feel free to take over https://github.com/laanwj/bitcoin/tree/2018_05_logprintf_remove_return_value, which removes the unused and incorrect return value from LogPrintstr and has this commit rebased on top.

events.message:
logging: remove unused return value from LogPrintStr

`LogPrintStr` returns the number of characters printed. This number is
doubled if both logging to console and logging to file is enabled. As
the return value is never used, I've opted to remove it instead of try
to fix it.

Credit: @laanwj

events.body: @laanwj Nice cleanup! Added that commit to this PR.

issue.title: Don't close old debug log file handle prematurely when trying to re-open (on SIGHUP)
issue.body:
Don't close old debug log file handle prematurely when trying to re-open (on `SIGHUP`).

Context: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13148#issuecomment-386288606

Thanks @ajtowns!

issue.title: [Logging] remove unused return value from LogPrintStr
issue.body: Bug introduced in b3a1d84a86888b68aaca954cd1529e651adc24c1: `LogPrintStr` no longer returning the character count, because bitcoin/bitcoin#13148 should have been included in the backport.
